description: This updates an existing billing group.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the billing group being updated.

parameters.name: ComputationPreference
parameters.description: The preferences and settings that will be used to compute the Amazon Web Services charges for a billing group. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pricing plan that's used to compute the Amazon Web Services charges for a billing group.

nested_params.name: PricingPlanArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pricing plan that's used to compute the Amazon Web Services charges for a billing group.

parameters.name: AccountGrouping
parameters.description: Specifies if the billing group has automatic account association ( AutoAssociate) enabled. AutoAssociate (boolean) --- Specifies if this billing group will automatically associate newly added Amazon Web Services accounts that join your consolidated billing family.

nested_params.name: AutoAssociate
nested_params.description: Specifies if this billing group will automatically associate newly added Amazon Web Services accounts that join your consolidated billing family.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the billing group that was updated.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the billing group. The names must be unique to each billing group.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the billing group.

nested_items.name: PrimaryAccountId
nested_items.description: The account ID that serves as the main account in a billing group.

nested_items.name: PricingPlanArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pricing plan to compute Amazon Web Services charges for the billing group.

nested_items.name: Size
nested_items.description: The number of accounts in the particular billing group.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The most recent time when the billing group was modified.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the billing group. Only one of the valid values can be used.

nested_items.name: StatusReason
nested_items.description: The reason why the billing group is in its current status.

nested_items.name: AccountGrouping
nested_items.description: Specifies if the billing group has automatic account association ( AutoAssociate) enabled.

nested_items.name: AutoAssociate
nested_items.description: Specifies if this billing group will automatically associate newly added Amazon Web Services accounts that join your consolidated billing family.
